content: Tammy Hembrow has showed off her washboard abs and toned physique just 10 months after giving birth.

The fitness influencer posted some racy snaps to her Instagram on Friday. In the photos, the 29-year-old  flaunted her tanned and toned body in a skimpy pink bikini. She shared several photos of her posing by a pool in the thong bikini to her over 16 million followers. The mother-of-three captioned the sizzling snaps: 'No rain no flowers'.

She accessorised the look with a straw bucket hat and a pair of gold hoop earrings. Tammy kept her short blonde locks down and behind her ears as she opted for a makeup free look to show off her natural beauty.She welcomed her youngest daughter Posie 10 months ago with her ex-fiancé Matt Poole.She already shares two children, Wolf, six, and Saskia, five, with her ex-fiancé Reece Hawkins.

Last month, she finally broke her silence on her split with Matt, which occurred just seven months after they welcomed their baby girl.Tammy replied to a fan who asked 'What happened with you and Matt?' in the comments underneath a TikTok video.'Some people are just not meant to be together no matter how hard they try. We are much better as friends. Not that it's anyone's business' she wrote.
